title: Who's the Boss?
description: When your enemy becomes your boss, tensions are bound to boil over…Arrogant, charming and sexy as hell, Master chef Sean Kincaid is legendary both in the kitchen and in the bedroom. So of course it only took five minutes for him to get me overheated. My temper that is. Because Sean Kincaid is my new boss. Who has strolled into my kitchen demanding I follow his rules. I don’t like taking orders from anyone but certainly not from a grumpy man who knows how to push all of my buttons.And when a Best Chef competition pits the two of us against each other, it’s either going to be a sizzler--or a recipe for disaster.
author: Erin McCarthy
